publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3187 Angela Constance: Congratulations to River Kids—That the Parliament acknowledges and applauds the innovative and imaginative approach displayed by the River Kids charity in its fundraising activities in West Lothian and the significant contribution and support that it gives to the young people of West Lothian in targeting better education, healthcare and other life-improving causes.

S3M-3187 Congratulations to River Kids (lodged on 7 January 2009) Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Christina McKelvie*, Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jack McConnell*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-3187 Angela Constance: Congratulations to River Kids—That the Parliament acknowledges and applauds the innovative and imaginative approach displayed by the River Kids charity in its fundraising activities in West Lothian and the significant contribution and support that it gives to the young people of West Lothian in targeting better education, healthcare and other life-improving causes. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville, Christina McKelvie, Alasdair Allan, Stuart McMillan, Aileen Campbell, Kenneth Gibson, Jack McConnell, Bashir Ahmad, Bill Kidd, Sandra White*
S3M-3187 Congratulations to River Kids (lodged on 7 January 2009) Gil Paterson*
